description:
Hilarious, Random, and FUN ringtones!

This ringtone application is a great value. Purchasing this application gives you the complete Ridiculous Rings Collection, PLUS full access to NEW ringtones that we will continue to add to this fabulous collection in the future. No subscription fees. No cost per download. Unlimited downloads guaranteed. 

THE RIDICULOUS RINGS COLLECTION:

- Do you miss the Nokia ringtone? The new generation of this memorable ringtone is available in hot remixed hip-hop and rock versions! 
- Do you like special sound effects? Various sound effects are available on this application, ranging from the distinct Lamborghini engine roar to a laughing baby, there’s a special sound effect just for you. 
- All of these Hilarious, Random and FUN ringtones and a lot MORE are available in this collection!

ABOUT RIDICULOUS RINGS APP:
- UNLIMITED downloads
- Access to NEW Ridiculous Rings we will continue to add in the future  
- Pay once, no subscription fees
- Set a unique ringtone for each caller in your phonebook

NOTE: We highly recommend that you have WiFi or good network connection in order to experience the full functionality of this app.
